Bilder Inc

One central space for personal memories

Organization. Consumation. Sharing. Backing up. All in one.

Why is this so cool?

Bilder Inc. tackles 3 big problems of personal photography today

Eliminate clutter
Many photo libraries are distributed among different types of media: on phones, computers, harddrives or event prints. Specific photos aren’t found quickly this way. The centralised nature of BilderBox helps with this.
Bring photos back to life
More and more photos are taken every day. Yet we tend to not look at them very often. BilderBook and BilderBeam promote the consumation of your memories: enjoy personalised photo curations!
Secure
& Private
Photos are very private memories. We at Bilder Inc. belive that you should be in control of your privacy. The Bilder system never loads any data to the cloud. All photos stay local in your BilderBox. Same thing for our AI-Software.
